text_en: WOMEN WHO ARE PREGNANT OR BREASTFEEDING Avoid antidepressants, if possible. Consider antidepressants at the lowest effective dose if there is no response to psychosocial interventions. If the woman is breastfeeding, avoid long acting antidepressant medication such as fluoxetine. Consult a specialist if available.
